subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James made the timely shots. He threw the necessary passes. He kept the crowd at a packed Quicken Loans Arena on edge, on its feet and twirling its promotional towels.
snippet: LeBron James made the timely shots. He threw the necessary passes. He kept the crowd at a packed Quicken Loans Arena on edge, on its feet and twirling its promotional towels.
